songs.title: Lil Tape
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Hyperactive off this Actavis
Lil hoe, don't ask me shit
Why you so rude?
Shit, I don't know bitch, ask my dick
I ain't got no choice but to act like this
East side nigga with a up north twist
Hammer time on you dime
She love my hits, say she love my hits
Like I'm me to me
Down south with my southern belle
And hell yeah, the bitch get it
Catch my lil ugly ass on yo TV screens
6 niggas love to talk shit
We won't need no reason
Flexing and smoking
They seem to be my only points of reason
But I'm never committing treason
Mistletoe above her dro
Make her swallow kids man, 'tis the season
I'm stunting so regious
I wish Russ could see this
Going hard but I make this shit look easy
Best believe me, nigga

[Hook]
Lil bitch, I know you know
Lil tape, lil tape, lil tape
Lil tape, lil tape, lil tape, lil tape
Bitch's tape, bitch's tape, bitch's tape
Lil tape, lil tape, lil tape
Bitch's tape, lil tape, lil tape
Lil tape, lil tape, lil tape
Bitch's tape, bitch's tape, bitch's tape
Lil tape, lil tape, lil tape, lil tape

[Verse 2]
I ain't back by popular demand
I never left
Bitch you know I was the best
It's lil tape and no one else
Man it's ganging in myself
Motherfuck you and your help
Put a Xan' inside my Jameson
And then I watch it melt
I got hoes, neon silk
Whole quarter, I got the belt
Zone 60, know me well
Section A1, never fail
All my days ones stay right here
All my days ones stay right here
And I know they'll never switch
Lil tape inside this bitch

[Hook]
Lil bitch, I know you know
Lil tape, lil tape, lil tape
Lil tape, lil tape, lil tape, lil tape
Bitch's tape, bitch's tape, bitch's tape
Lil tape, lil tape, lil tape
Bitch's tape, lil tape, lil tape
Lil tape, lil tape, lil tape, lil tape
Bitch's tape, bitch's tape, bitch's tape
Lil tape, lil tape, lil tape, lil tape
